thread.title: Ciara salutes Whitney Houston with 'I'm Every Woman' dance routine

author: USA TODAY
title: Ciara salutes Whitney Houston with 'I'm Every Woman' dance routine
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Ciara salutes Whitney Houston with 'I'm Every Woman' dance routine This gives us hope that Beyoncé won't be afraid to dance Sunday at the Grammys. Post to Facebook Ciara salutes Whitney Houston with 'I'm Every Woman' dance routine This gives us hope that Beyoncé won't be afraid to dance Sunday at the Grammys.  //usat.ly/2l1up3u
